channel.title: Ini adalah home dari theme on Bokumentation
channel.description: Recent content in Ini adalah home dari theme on Bokumentation

item.title: ESP32 CAM CCTV PROJECT
item.description: Task: Get ready for task: Find tutorial about ESP32 + OV7670 and Tensorflow Lite Apply code and Try (you can call adit for help) Create 3D model and Print (jean) Assembly Create documentation and upload to YouTube Feature Can show imaging camera from website or web server can capture photo and video can save photo and video in sd card can download the file using LAN can record unlimited recording can night vision mode Machine Learning Feature can detect people and identification detect people and send warning to user What We Need Hardware ESP32 Datasheet & Pinout: OV7670 Datasheet & Pinout: Micro-SD Adapter Datasheet & Pinout: For night vision: infrared led that supported by OV7670 Library C and C++ compiler Arduino IDE and the library Espressif IDE and the library Platform IO and the library CH340G software driver Github Unofficial esp32cam or maybe official by espressif esp32-camera

item.title: Hugo Quick Start
item.description: Quickstart Generating new site use hugo command hugo new site <nama situs atau folder> Nanti akan generate folder dengan nama situs serta file yang dibutuhkan Open your website folder that have created cd <folder nama situs> Masuk ke folder yang sudah dibuat Git command for initiate git init Inisialisasi git Install hugo theme using git submodule add space themes/folder_name git submodule add <hugo theme link dari github> themes/<nama folder tema> Install tema hugo

item.title: Upgrading High CRI LAMP
item.description: Task: Why we did that? Definition of CRI and RA Benefit How we did? list of ingredient we did closing And that how we Upgrading my Lamp into Studio Quality

Yang biasa digunakan git init #initialize an existing directory as Git Repo git clone [url] #copy or download entire Repo via URL git add . #add recent directory to stage git commit -m "[description]" #staged content as a new commit snapshot git push #upload to git repository Instalasi Git Windows -> download github for windows Linux Ubuntu -> sudo apt-get install git MacOS -> brew install git Setup git config --global user.
